bike.description: Need a Track Bike that's lighter and faster? The Super Pista's aluminum frame and carbon forkare designed just for that. The track is its number one duty. Available as frameset only. Also available in White, Satin Black/Celeste and Italian Tri-Colors. (Frameset: $899.00 Tri-Color) Frame: D2 Pista Alloy.
paint_description: Celeste, Satin Black, Satin White, Satin Red

components.description: Bianchi Carbon Straight Aero Blade Alu/Carbon 1 1/8"
